articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: An $80 billion crash in smallcaps flashes warning signs - The Economic Times
articles.description: A sharp correction in small-cap stocks is affecting the broader Indian market. The index of small-cap stocks has lost over $80 billion in market value. The MSCI India Index is lagging behind Asia Pacific index. The regulator expressed concern about price mani…
articles.content: A sharp correction in small-cap stocks portends souring risk appetite on the broader Indian market, which is now an underperformer in Asia Pacific after a multi-year rally.An index of small-cap stock… [+3272 chars]
